title: What services does DiscoverReady provide? - Quora

response.answer_text: DiscoverReady provides a wide array of services across the broad spectrum of our clients' e-discovery needs, including:  ConsultingOur on-staff subject matter and technical experts can provide our clients with a variety of consulting services, from assisting with Early Case Assessment to helping draft and propose a Predictive Coding protocol with opposing counsel, and many other situations.Data AnalysisThrough the use of industry-standard data analytics tools, as well as proprietary software, we can help our clients to better undertand the nature of the data being considered for review, as well as to provide guidance on how to use that information to lower their total cost of review over one or many sequential projects.Technology ServicesOur hosting, processing, and production facilities are state-of-the-art in both security and technology, and our large-scale operations allow us to quickly ramp up our resources to handle the largest of matters in a very brief time.Managed ReviewThrough the use of professional project and review managers, the application of proven lean methodologies, and our fixed-fee document review model, our managed review services provide proven lower cost to our clients on matters ranging from 5,000 to 5,000,000 documents.Predictive CodingDiscoverReady has been using TAR tools such as Predictive Coding for more than five years to provide our clients with access to cutting edge technologies that remain effective, defensible, and secure.  Our proven results demonstrate that Predictive Coding can significantly reduce the overall cost of review when deployed on the right case at the right time.Managed ServicesMany of our clients engage with DiscoverReady in long-term, ongoing relationships that allow our professional project and review managers to learn how our clients prefer to work and apply those learnings to adapt later review projects to further decrease the client's overall spend on e-discovery.  We work closely with both inside and outside counsel to ensure that we are constantly improving our processes and procedures, and delivering the high quality results expected of us while focusing on lowering overall cost to our clients.Full Disclosure: I currently work as the Director of Product Marketing for DiscoverReady.
